value:
Swimsuits are made for swimming.
Had I known I'd be battling too, I
would have brought another outfit.

I've never played at the beach
before... I must be sure to tell
Princess Nyna how much fun it is!

You brought me a parasol for the
sun? Thank you so much! But... Are
you going to be OK? It's very sunny.

You want to race me to the water?
If you insist. But I must warn you...$k$pWalking normally on sand is a basic
skill among mages!

I don't have much swimming
experience... Am I supposed to warm
up first? Can you show me how?

Are you $Nu?$k$pI have a summertime greeting for you
from $Nf!

I feel amazing right now! Perhaps
I'll go for a swim.

Don't underestimate me because
I'm without my usual battle attire.

Sorry... I just didn't want to get a
sunburn!

Oh, thank you so much! Now if
only I could find my parasol...

I am Linde, daughter of Pontifex
Miloah. My duty as a mage in your
ranks will always come first, but...$k$pI am hoping to find some time to
enjoy the summer weather as well.

Don't you get hot wearing that hood in
this heat? You're always looking after
me, so I want to do the same for you.$k$pHuh? It's because you have nothing
better to do? Hehe, well, if you say
so... But I've seen how you help us.$k$pI am truly thankful to you for helping
me find a few peaceful days among
so much awful battle.$k$pSpeaking of... Would you like to go
for a swim with me while things are
calm?$k$pWe need to appreciate these
peaceful moments while we can.
But also...$k$pI'd like to remember this summer with
you forever.
ええいっ！
さあ！
だめぇっ！
ま、待って…！
Divine sea, heed me!
Don't give me that look!
You'll get sunburnt!
I won't drown!
I'm...drowning...
Um...
This attire is perfect for a swim. There's nothing odd about it.
You weren't trying to sneak up on me, were you?
This is a nice swimsuit, but... Am I here to swim?
My robe usually keeps me covered, but now I have to worry about a sunburn.
You think this looks good on me? How nice of you to say.
I've never even considered playing in the ocean before...
Do you think you could...teach me to swim?
Hmm...
Watch over me.
It's a hot one.
